fig.label: Figure 3

caption.p: Percentage of worldwide influenza A(H3N2) viruses with specified amino acid residues at haemagglutinin (H3) positions 159 and 193, by year, GISAID, 1968–2019 (n = 83,026)

fig.p: GISAID: Global Initiative on Sharing All Influenza Data.

The proportion of influenza A(H3N2) viruses with the specified amino acids at positions 159 (panel A) and 193 (panel B) are displayed by year since 1968; actual tallies by year are provided in Supplementary Table S13. Note that the number of A(H3) sequences is not consistent from year to year, with generally less than 100 A(H3) sequences per year until the 1990s (excepting 1968), less than 1,000 per year until 2003 and more than 1,000 per year thereafter available for download from GISAID.
